start_main_title: Provide identity verification details for a person with significant control (PSC)
start_service_description: Use this service to provide a Companies House personal code for a person with significant control (PSC).
start_inset_text: You can also use this service to check when a company's PSCs need to provide their personal codes.
start_service_restriction_description: You cannot use this service if the PSC has their personal information protected at Companies House (or is waiting for the results of an application)
start_when_to_verify_heading: When you need to provide verification details
start_when_to_verify_description1: This depends on whether the PSC was registered with Companies House before or after identity verification requirements were introduced on
start_when_to_verify_description2: If they were registered as a PSC before
start_when_to_verify_description3: , they have 14 days starting from the companyâ€™s confirmation statement date. They cannot do it before then.
start_when_to_verify_description4: If they were registered as a PSC after
start_when_to_verify_description5: , they have 14 days starting from the date they were registered.
start_warning_text: If a PSC does not comply with identity verification requirements, they will be committing an offence and may have to pay a financial penalty or fine.
start_before_list: To use this service, you'll need:
start_before_list_item1: to sign in, or create sign in details
start_before_list_item3: the PSC's Companies House personal code
start_personal_code_details_main_link: What is a Companies House personal code?
start_personal_code_details_description: This is an 11 character code that is given to a person after they have verified their identity for Companies House.
start_personal_code_details_link: verifying your identity for Companies House.
start_guidance_duration_description: It can take up to 10 minutes to provide verification details for a PSC.
